title: MintK was made for the Korean community.
body:
We made a space where we can talk about Mintclub or exchange information in Korean.

1. Openkakao talk- Mint Korea Club
https://open.kakao.com/o/gjOQdbod

2. Telegram- Mint Korea Club
https://t.me/MintKorea

3. Naver Cafe(Mint Korea Club) was created to be used as a more popular community space for users who do not use Steemit in Korea.
https://cafe.naver.com/mintkoreaclub

4. Naver Cafe(Mint Korea Club) has a Korean tutorial page for people who first came to know the mint club.

Mint Club Tutorial in Korean
1. Send Coin from Upbit to Binance -> In Binance, exchange coins for BNB.
https://cafe.naver.com/mintkoreaclub/4

2. Create Metamask Wallet.
https://cafe.naver.com/mintkoreaclub/5

3. Send BNB to Metamask + Buy Mint Club from Pancake Swap
https://cafe.naver.com/mintkoreaclub/18

4. Buy tokens in a mint club.
https://cafe.naver.com/mintkoreaclub/6

5. How to make tokens using mint clubs
https://cafe.naver.com/mintkoreaclub/7

MetaMask BSC Wallet is 
0x1a8BCB75052e346183DE24abB0D06AB41F1Fa864
author: 0x1a8BCB75052e346183DE24abB0D06AB41F1Fa864
